name: places/ChIJATdb1QlZwokRlzTY-xD8iik
formattedAddress: 235 E 89th St, New York, NY 10128, USA
adrFormatAddress: 235 E 89th St, New York, NY 10128, USA

originalText.text:
I believe it was fate that I stumbled over an instagram page “the bengal cats”. I lost my husband to cancer January 2023, who I was in my life for 50 years. I decided in June 2023 to look into getting a bengal kitten (which was my dream for so long). I inquired and they had a female kitten which would be ready in a few weeks. We named her Macchli, after a famous bengal tiger in Asia. Macchli is such a beautiful, intelligent and loving kitty. She is now nearly 8 months old. She instinctively taught herself to play fetch. She is so incredibly smart.
Mark was very helpful and helped with any questions I had on raising a bengal.  I would definitely recommend them on purchasing a quality, healthy cat. Thank you Mark & Cloe for bringing Macchli into my life. She has helped me through one of the most challenging times of my life- the loss of my husband. Thank you Mark for always responding back so quickly for any questions I may have.

text.text:
I believe it was fate that I stumbled over an instagram page “the bengal cats”. I lost my husband to cancer January 2023, who I was in my life for 50 years. I decided in June 2023 to look into getting a bengal kitten (which was my dream for so long). I inquired and they had a female kitten which would be ready in a few weeks. We named her Macchli, after a famous bengal tiger in Asia. Macchli is such a beautiful, intelligent and loving kitty. She is now nearly 8 months old. She instinctively taught herself to play fetch. She is so incredibly smart.
Mark was very helpful and helped with any questions I had on raising a bengal.  I would definitely recommend them on purchasing a quality, healthy cat. Thank you Mark & Cloe for bringing Macchli into my life. She has helped me through one of the most challenging times of my life- the loss of my husband. Thank you Mark for always responding back so quickly for any questions I may have.

originalText.text: If you’ve been looking into getting a Bengal cat I would really look no further than the Bengals Mark has to offer. From the first conversation not only could I tell he had years of experience of caring for these cats but that he also cares. He wants to ensure that every single kitten goes to a loving home and that in itself speaks volumes. When my boy Adonis first came home you can tell he was showered with love and was fed only the best meals by the way he radiates, afterwards I took him to the vet only to confirm he was perfectly healthy and thriving. I was genuinely surprised at how well socialized he was from the beginning and Adonis was already familiar with his litter box. He is the sweetest boy and incredibly intelligent, on top of this Mark was always available to answer my questions and address my concerns with the upmost professionalism. Rest assured if you decide to adopt a kitten from this cattery you are getting a quality Bengal with the highest pedigree ,which I also received documentation to prove it. Thank you guys for connecting me with the perfect companion, when I decide to adopt another there’s no place else I’d rather go to.

originalText.text: We could not be happier with the newest member of our family! She is so loved already, and even MORE beautiful than I could have imagined. Mark was amazing to work with, super helpful, and always available to answer any questions I had. You can tell Mark and Chloe take such great care of these kittens, she’s the absolute sweetest! Thank you for my new best friend : )

Mark was amazing to work with, super helpful, and always available to answer any questions I had. You can tell Mark and Chloe take such great care of these kittens, she’s the absolute sweetest! Thank you for my new best friend : )

originalText.text: I have been used to rescuing my cats and was very apprehensive about going to a breeder but I had a wonderful experience! Mark was extremely helpful and informative and they definitely treat their kitties with so much love and care about the homes that they go to. I still reach out to them post adoption and they are extremely helpful and timely with responses. Thank you so much for our wonderful addition to our family and for caring so much about your kittens! ♥️

originalText.text: I’m so happy to have gone with these breeders. Mark is awesome and super kind. He’s always willing to answer questions and actually cares about the wellness of the kittens he is giving away. He dropped off Leo today and I automatically fell in love. Leo super friendly, affectionate, and playful. He also has a lot of energy. I highly recommend them to anyone who interested in adopting a Bengal kitten.
